skills.name: Textbook Tactics (戦術の手本)
skills.text:
1. If in a T-Advantage Engagement, Crit Rate of [Main Battery] increased by 50%. If in a Parallel or Head-on Engagement, Crit Rate of [Main Battery] increased by 25%.
2. When [Main Battery Salvo] hits, 100% to inflict [Inhibited], preventing the target from repairing for 10 seconds.

skills.name: Guardian (護衛の極意)
skills.text:
1. Increases Flagship's Crit Rate by 20%.
2. After a battle ends, repairs Flagship by 20% of the Flagship's Max HP.
